TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Unit extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示長度的度量。

span.span: Represents a length measurement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構代表長度可以表示任何 HTML 相容大小單位的度量。The structure represents a length measurement that can be expressed in any HTML-compatible size unit. 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 列出可以表示的度量單位。The enumeration lists the units of measurement that can be represented. 這類的使用屬性`BorderWidth`和`Height`來表示的長度或寬度屬性。The is used by properties such as `BorderWidth` and `Height` to represent the length or width of the property. 例如，您可以設定到 Web 伺服器控制項的屬性表示五個像素為單位。For example, you can set the property of a Web Server control to a that represents five pixels. > [!NOTE] > 類別可代表介於-32768 到 32767 之間的值。The class can represent values only between -32768 and 32767. 使用屬性來判斷度量單位的長度。Use the property to determine the length of the measurement. 度量單位用來決定屬性。The unit of measurement is determined using the property. 您可以將其他資料類型轉換使用， ， ，和方法。You can convert other data types to a by using the , , , and methods. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有控制項都支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體結構使用指定的雙精確度浮點數。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the structure using the specified double precision floating point number. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||`value` 指定的值。The value specified by `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > 如果`value`是不介於-32768 到 32767 之間，會擲回例外狀況。If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.

span.span: is not between -32768 and 32767.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體結構使用指定的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the structure using the specified 32-bit signed integer. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||`value` 指定的值。The value specified by `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > 如果`value`是不介於-32768 到 32767 之間，會擲回例外狀況。If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.

summary.span: 使用指定的長度，初始化 結構的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure with the specified length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體結構使用指定的長度。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the structure using the specified length. 長度已指定兩個部分，長度的值類型和長度的單位類型中。The length is specified in two parts, the length's value and the length's unit type. 例如，"200 Cm"代表長度為 200 公分為單位。For example, "200Cm" represents a length of 200 centimeters. 您可以使用任何有效的 CSS 標準單位運算式。You can use any valid CSS-compliant unit expression. 下表列出常見的單位類型。The following table lists the common unit types. |單位類型Unit type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Pixel`|像素為單位的長度。Length in pixels.| |`Point`|以點為單位的長度。Length in points. 一個點數表示 1/72 英吋。A point represents 1/72 of an inch.| |`Inch`|以英吋為單位的長度。Length in inches.| |`Mm`|以公釐為單位的長度。Length in millimeters.| |`Cm`|以公分為單位的長度。Length in centimeters.| |`Percentage`|以父元素的百分比表示的長度。Length as a percentage of the parent element.| 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||中指定的單位類型`value`。The unit type specified in `value`.| ||中指定的值`value`。The value specified in `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > 如果`value`是不介於-32768 到 32767 之間，會擲回例外狀況。If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.

exception.span: 指定長度不在 -32768 和 32767 之間。

span.span: The specified length is not between -32768 and 32767.

exception.span: 不是有效的 CSS 相容單位運算式。

span.span: is not a valid CSS-compliant unit expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來比較從呼叫這個方法所指定的物件與`obj`。Use the method to compare the that this method is called from with the object specified by `obj`. 對於兩個相等物件而言，它們在 和 屬性上必須有相同的值。For both objects to be equal, they must have the same values for both the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 所指定的物件`obj`必須由為了讓比較成功的型別物件。The object specified by `obj` must by a type object for the comparison to succeed. 如果物件是`null`，`false`傳回。If the object is `null`, `false` is returned.

param.name: formatProvider
param.span: 介面實作，提供特定文化特性的格式資訊。

span.span: An interface implementation that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式提供者，將 轉換成對等字串。

span.span: Converts a to a string equivalent using the specified format provider.

returns.span: ，表示以 指定之格式顯示的這個 。

span.span: A representing this in the format specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回一個單位使用格式化的字串表示法以及代表單位的縮寫。The method returns a string representation formatted with a unit and an abbreviation representing the unit . 下表列出值和其相對應的縮寫。The following table lists values and their corresponding abbreviation. |單位類型Unit type|縮寫Abbreviation| |---------------|------------------| ||pxpx| ||ptpt| ||pcpc| ||中的in| ||mmmm| ||cmcm| ||%| ||emem| ||exex| 使用`formatProvider`來指定用來格式化特定文化特性資訊。Use `formatProvider` to specify culture-specific information used to format the . 如果`formatProvider`是`null`，就會使用預設格式化字串的數字部份物件目前的文化特性設定。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the numeric portion of the string is formatted using a default object set for the current culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷度量單位，代表，例如像素為單位。Use the property to determine the unit of measurement that the represents, such as pixels. 屬性由其中一個列舉值。The property is represented by one of the enumeration values. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`true`、傳回列舉值。If property is set to `true`, the enumeration value is returned.
